title: Bobby Asks Darius Rucker About IHOP Gesture + Matt Stell Performs His #1's In Studio + Mike D Gets Pepper Sprayed
itunes:title: Bobby Asks Darius Rucker About IHOP Gesture + Matt Stell Performs His #1's In Studio + Mike D Gets Pepper Sprayed
description:
Bobby talks with Darius Rucker about buying everyone’s meals at IHOP, his new song "Beers and Sunshine" and also pitches him some clever business ideas. New artist Matt Stell stops by the studio to perform his hits “Prayed for You”, “Everywhere But On” and even a brand new song! Plus, Bobby finally plays back the audio of Mike D getting pepper sprayed!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
